alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 10:01PM CST until March 01 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CST FOR NORTHERN MADISON...NORTHEASTERN LIMESTONE AND SOUTHERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 1001 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harvest, or 11 miles west of Meridianville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Ardmore, Harvest, New Market, Lincoln, Elkwood and Plevna. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central, northeastern and northwestern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
